title: Take Two
description: The fifth funny book in a girly series with a dark twist—cheerleaders, vampires, and cute boys all add up to a killer story with bite Hollywood has come to Franklin Grove! Olivia is very excited. Jackson Caulfield—the hot teen movie star—is shooting a movie in her home town, and there's a chance to win a part in the film. So when she bumps into Jackson and he shows her around the set, she thinks her dreams have come true. Could Jackson possibly be a vampire?
author: Sienna Mercer
